__e: It'd be a pleasure to flirt with her!
I would gladly take a walk in our garden with you
Thank you, I've already eaten, but I'd love some coffee.
Perhaps I'll be able to explain them to you, and I'll do it gladly.
I would if I could, eh? But I can't.
Daniel, I won't bore you, but if I could grab the Lord's hand for help I would, but He does these things all the time.
She worships her brother and talks freely about him.
Purely by chance, I found out from Fazio something about Nicotra's death. Namely that it wasn't suicide, but that he was strangled and they made it look like he hung himself.
He speaks gratefully of the pain you inflicted upon him, pain which cleared the mist from his eyes and showed, with the sharpness of torture, exactly why you must know where our bombers came from.
